executiveSummary: Kelly and Christina from San Francisco pitched their company, Yard Sale, seeking $200,000 for 10% equity on Shark Tank. They presented their innovative magnetic, customizable ski poles designed to improve skier convenience and style. After multiple Sharks declined, Kendra Scott offered $250,000 for 10% equity with a $5 royalty until $300,000 is recouped, which the founders accepted.
keyDecisions: Deal made with Kendra Scott for $250,000 for 10% equity with a $5 royalty per unit until $300,000 is recouped.

actionItems.task: Collaborate with Kendra Scott to expand Yard Saleâ€™s wholesale and retail distribution strategy.
Develop and launch adjustable ski poles for adults next year.

nextSteps: Kelly and Christina will partner with Kendra Scott to scale their business, focusing on retail expansion and new product development, including adjustable poles for adults.
